page.title: 02YELVERTOFT PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The oldest part of the school was used in the 19th century.It has only two classrooms and a school house. Later two more stages were built on to the old school.The first was built in 1970 ,it has got a hall ,canteen and two classrooms.The last was built in 1976 and it consists of two classrooms. Altogether we have 5 classrooms but 1 is used as a craft room. We can have school meals or we can bring sandwiches.The school has 2 playgrounds and a large field with a football pitch.We have a library which is maintained by volunteer parents. we come to the school in the year we are 5 and we leave when we are 11 and then we go to Guilsborough county school.
